Uses of Interface
game.Behaviour

    • Uses of Behaviour in game

      Classes in game that implement Behaviour 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AttackBehaviour
      A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
      class  ChantBehaviour
      A class that generates SpawnZombieAction or VanishAction when the actor's player turn exceeds a certain value such as every 10 turns.
      class  CheckWeaponBehaviour
      A class that generates PickUpItemAction when the Actor is standing on a weapon item.
      class  EatBehaviour
      A class that generates EatAction when it goes through the list of item the actor is in and the ItemCapability of the item is a food.
      class  FarmingBehaviour
      A class that generates SowingAction or FertiliseAction by checking the ItemCapability and type of the crop at that location.
      class  FollowBehaviour
      A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
      class  HarvestBehaviour
      Class represents the Behaviour of harvesting a RIPE crop and return an Action that allows the Actor to harvest the crop when the crop is RIPE.
      class  HuntBehaviour
      Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
      class  StunBehaviour
      Class that generates the SunAction when the player is able to be stunend.
      class  WanderBehaviour
      Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
      Fields in game declared as Behaviour 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Behaviour[] MamboMarie.behaviours 
      private Behaviour[] Farmer.behaviours 
      private Behaviour[] Human.behaviours 
      private Behaviour[] Witch.behaviours 
      private Behaviour[] Zombie.behaviours 
      Fields in game with type parameters of type Behaviour 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<Behaviour> ZombieActor.behaviourlist 
      Methods in game with parameters of type Behaviour 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void ZombieActor.addBehaviour(Behaviour behaviour)
      Add a behaviour that the Zombie implements
